FuncDef:
The service deactivate-record command enables a device to record information about deactivating a service.
The undo service deactivate-record command disables a device to record information about deactivating a service.
By default, a device is enabled to record information about deactivating a service.
ExtraInfo: To enable a device to record information about deactivating a service, run the service deactivate-record command. The recorded information helps diagnose faults.
